title: Dying for a Cure: A Memoir of Antidepressants, Misdiagnosis and Madness
description: Shortly after the birth of her daughter, Rebekah Beddoe was diagnosed with post-natal depression. Two years later she was taking six different drugs. This is a powerful memoir of the nightmarish three years Rebekah endured as she was repeatedly misdiagnosed, only to realise that it was her medication that was causing her illness.
author: Rebekah Beddoe
